function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Misinformation and lack of education on contagious diseases"},{"name":"Hoarding masks and medical supplies"},{"name":"Inadequate support for schools, businesses, and furloughed workers"},{"name":"Lack of border control and case identification leading to unmonitored spread of contagious diseases"},{"name":"Misallocation of resources leading to inadequate supply of essential medical equipment like masks"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation leading to public anxiety and confusion"},{"name":"Proactive case finding and retesting for covid 19"},{"name":"Overloading of the hotline system"},{"name":"Disease stigma and compassion for affected individuals"},{"name":"Proximity to mainland china and high number of flights increase the risk of covid-19 transmission to taiwan."},{"name":"Constant alert and readiness to act on epidemics arising from china since the 2003 sars epidemic."},{"name":"Health declaration border pass and mobile phone tracking for immigration clearance and quarantine enforcement."},{"name":"High requirement of technical personnel and high costs"},{"name":"Residual disinfectants after disinfection"},{"name":"Relative narrow disinfection spectrum and complex impact factors"},{"name":"Improper disposal of infectious and pathological wastes leading to disease transmission"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection methods leading to incomplete destruction of toxic components"},{"name":"Lack of proper training and expertise in handling advanced disinfection technologies"},{"name":"Improper disinfection of hospital wastes and wastewater"},{"name":"Use of contaminated wastewater and sludge as agricultural fertilizer"},{"name":"Lack of qualified personnel for waste management and disposal"},{"name":"Use of chlorine disinfection in hospital wastewater may result in chlorine-resistant pathogens."},{"name":"Improper handling of infectious waste may lead to the spread of the sars-cov-2 virus."},{"name":"Improper disinfection of hospital wastes may lead to the persistence of infectious materials."},{"name":"Limited studies on sars-cov-2 inactivation"},{"name":"Prolonged survival of sars viruses in hospital wastewater and waste"},{"name":"Variable efficiency of ozone disinfection"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through contaminated hospital waste and wastewater"},{"name":"Inadequate studies on the inactivation of sars-cov-2"},{"name":"Improper disposal of pharmaceutical wastes at sanitary landfills"},{"name":"Discharge of chemical wastes into the drainage system"},{"name":"Improper handling and disposal of radioactive wastes"},{"name":"Improper disposal of infectious wastes"},{"name":"Improper disinfection of disposable medical supplies"},{"name":"Inadequate disposal of pharmaceutical wastes"},{"name":"High temperature incineration may generate hazardous substances like dioxins during low temperature combustion"},{"name":"Mixing non-hazardous wastes with hazardous or infectious pollutants may require special disposal and disinfection"},{"name":"Different disinfection and disposal methods should be adopted based on unique characteristics of different hospital wastes"},{"name":"Introduction of new disinfection technologies may lead to improper implementation and potential errors in operation"},{"name":"Inconsistent sterilization temperatures and fluctuation ranges may compromise the effectiveness of high temperature steam disinfection"},{"name":"Low volume reduction rate and generation of toxic volatile organic compounds during high temperature steam disinfection"},{"name":"Potential for inadequate disinfection due to lack of control over the inactivation process and moisture content"},{"name":"Misuse of conventional microwave units leading to ineffective disinfection"},{"name":"Potential environmental pollution and health risks due to improper disposal of biohazardous wastes and toxic residues after disinfection"},{"name":"Infectious microorganisms surviving plasma incineration"},{"name":"Poor treatment of hospital wastes with chemical disinfection"},{"name":"Ineffective physical disinfection using microwave technology"},{"name":"Incomplete combustion due to excess air demand"},{"name":"High investment costs for small and medium scale equipment"},{"name":"Complicated maintenance and high maintenance costs"}]}
